ProductInfo.Features:
36 IR illuminators for night vision. Horizontal Resolution: 520 TV lines. Lens: 6.0mm
Affordable day night audio video CMOS security camera. NTSC signal system
Built-in audio microphone and built-in mechanical IR-Cut filter switch
Aluminum housing for indoor outdoor application. Built-in light sensor controls IR activation
Package included: 1 of CMOS camera, 1 of 12V DC 500mA power supply and 1 of security warning decal
ProductInfo.Name: VideoSecu Outdoor Infrared Audio Bullet Surveillance Security Camera 520TVL High Resolution Built-in Microphone Day Night IR-Cut Filter CCTV Home Surveillance with Bonus Power Supply and Security Warning Sticker C1P
